name: LocalizedUIComponents
summary: LocalizedUIComponents is a library to easily add localization to storyboards.
description: The library includes three UIComponents (LocalizedButton, LocalizedLabel, LocalizedPlaceholderTextField). Use this components instead of the standard UIButton, UILabel and UITextField in Storyboards/Xib files and just use your language keys as title/text/placeholder and they are automatically localized at runtime.
